name: Flip A Color - new Whack Story
name_original: Flip A Color - new Whack Story
description:
Use your finger quickness to whack appearing Colors off the board.

Each of the colored tiles has a timer, so you have to be quick!

Be careful in your concentration mode, pressing a white tile makes you lose the game and start all over.

To reach the top levels you have to complete levels in a row without any mistake.
Which level will you reach?
